attributes.action: Ask for a Police and Inland Revenue Investigation into fraudulent MPs claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is obvious to the general public that there has been wide spread abuse of our tax payers money by many mps. We are looking for a just and fair parliament that is prepared to bring to account people that have abused and stolen from the british people, no one should be above the law in the home of democracy

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
